CustomField.formula: WheelProduct__c+' '+CASE(WheelProduct__c, 'Wheels', Diameter__r.D_mm__c+'x'+Hub__r.HubSize__c+', '+SteelGrade__r.Name+', '+AxLoadType__r.Name+', acc. to '+Name, 'Wheelsets', Diameter__r.D_mm__c+'x'+Hub__r.HubSize__c+' '+ AxLoadType__r.Name + ' ' + ' ' + AxleBox__r.Name, 'Axles', Diameter__r.D_mm__c + ' '+SteelGrade__r.Name+' '+ AxLoadType__r.Name+', acc. to '+Name, Diameter__r.D_mm__c+'x'+Hub__r.HubSize__c+', '+SteelGrade__r.Name+ Standard__r.Name +', acc. to '+Name )
CustomField.label: Product Details
